title: The Personal Shopper
description: How could my dad do this to me? I mean sure I may have gone over budget on my last few projects, but did he really need to hire someone to control all of my purchases? More importantly, did that person have to be Parker? The one man I've been in love with since I was 13. I will just have to play it cool. After he rejected me all those years ago, I will not let Parker weave his way into my heart again.
author: T.L. Quinn
